Sabin Sharma is a Research Associate at NCCS.
He is interested in speech sound disorders, language pathology in both pediatric and adult populations, and cognitive communication disorders. He is a clinical researcher studying effective assessment and treatment strategies for individuals with communication challenges.
He is the project manager in an Austrian Development Agency project in Nepal where he oversees a newborn hearing screening program at Tribhuvan University, Kathmandu.
He is a PhD student at the University of Mysore, India.
